page.title: 16Hilliers Pork Pie Factory.
page.content: First we were shown around the pork pie and pasties' factory.We had to put on clean overalls and white caps.Then we washed our hands before we went into the factory. Pies are made from fresh pork and pastry.The pastry is pressed into shape inside a metal hoop.The meat is placed in by a machine which also puts the lids on the pies. The automatic computerized pastry roller rolls the pastry to a thickness of{3mm.}The rolls weigh about{15kg. } Next,we were shown the room where the pies were cooked.There are{2}big ovens which are pre-heated to{360 degrees {centigrade.}In each oven there are big carousels.There is one oven for pies and one for pasties. When the pies have been cooled jelly is injected into them.After this they are wrapped and packed ready for sale.
